description: ff. 260. I5 Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1189H. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 514 (6: no. 2, commentary); Fihris al-makhṭūṭāt al-ʻArabīyah fī Maktabat al-Awqāf al-ʻĀmmah fī Baghdād, II, 3220. Commentary on the ʻAqīdah (Manẓūmah fī al-tawḥīd) of al-Dajānī al-Qushāshī (Mach, R. Yahuda, 2342). Incip.: بسم الله ... و صلى الله ... احمده بجمىع محامده ... اما بعد
author: Kūrānī, Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan, 1616 or 1617-approximately 1690

title.@value: Qaṣd al-sabīl ilá tawḥīd al-ḥaqq al-wakīl.

dlme_title_ara_latn: Qaṣd al-sabīl ilá tawḥīd al-ḥaqq al-wakīl.
creator: Kūrānī, Ibrāhīm ibn Ḥasan, 1616 or 1617-approximately 1690
subject: Dajānī al-Qushāshī, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, -1660 or 1661—ʻAqīdah
